title: DMFP — Diffusion Models for Flexible Packaging
description: Building latent diffusion pipelines that encode physical print constraints—ink coverage, halftone frequencies, substrate limits—directly into the generative process, targeting production-ready artwork for flexible packaging.

title: RobustSep — Physically-Accurate Colour Separation
description: A modular RGB→CMYK+ separation pipeline using learned ink models and spectral prediction. Handles extended gamuts, spot colours, and substrate-specific tuning while maintaining perceptual fidelity.

title: Deep RL Halftoning
description: Investigating reinforcement learning approaches to adaptive halftoning that optimise dot placement for perceptual quality under varying substrate and ink constraints.
